sentences.sContent: But the rain might have come too late to save many farmers' corn and soybean crops.
sentences.sContent_eng: But the rain might have come too late to save many farmers' corn and soybean crops.
sentences.sCn: 但这场雨可能来得太晚了，无力挽救许多农民的玉米和大豆作物。

sentences.sContent: Through baking and shelf life experiments, the application of soybean protein to the cake was studied.
sentences.sContent_eng: Through baking and shelf life experiments, the application of soybean protein to the cake was studied.
sentences.sCn: 通过焙烤和货架期实验，就大豆蛋白在蛋糕中的应用进行了研究。

phrases.pCn: 大豆卵磷脂（从大豆中提取的精华物质）
